radiographic_examinations.findings: Demonstrated intermittent asymmetry with posterior right-hemisphere background slowing, which was considered artifact.

Showed scattered 1-2 mm punctate foci of signal abnormality in the subcortical white matter predominantly in the frontal lobes; no ventricular enlargement or abnormal parenchymal or leptomeningeal enhancement noted.
Revealed lower than normal blood flow in the frontotemporal regions bilaterally; no ischemic areas noted.
